name: Adrian Fann
text: We had problems with soot coming out of our gas fireplace and wind and rain coming in. We purchased a fireplace insert from Atnip and it solved our problem. We were extremely pleased with the time they took to explain the many options and the computer image of how our existing mantle would look with the chosen insert. They took time to explain the remote in detail. I would definitely recommend them

resp.text: It was our pleasure to work with you. We are glad to hear you are completely satisfied. We strive to have happy customers. Please let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: John Fishman
text: If I could give a"0" star I would. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY! We have a gas fireplace installed by Atnip at least 10 yrs ago (before we bought house). In the yrs we've been here we had them out at least once every year and it still has never worked right. Since JANUARY (!) I've been trying to schedule a service appt with them. We finally were able to schedule something today and I took the day off for it. I did miss their call - my ringer was off. But they always text and their were no texts and they said they were AT THE DOOR ready to work but no one answered it. They NEVER knocked so they were lying! Then they argued with me NOT about the lying but about my ringer being off! Typical old school Huntsville Southern business that still works as if its the '70s and there's no one else to go to. They apparently don't care about the axioms: "The customer is always right."  or "Customer comes first."  I am just ashamed I tried to work with them for so long. . AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!! We

resp.text: Our policy is to ring the doorbell and knock on the door multiple times before we proceed to call or text the homeowner. Multiple attempts were made to contact the homeowner, but we eventually had to move to the next job as contact was never made.

name: James Dint
text: Excellent service! Atnip has been around the area for as long as I can remember and I can't recommend them more. Huge showroom with lots of options to look at. I believe their installers (both named Mike if I remember correctly) were very knowledgeable and did an excellent job of installing my gas fireplace. I will continue to use them!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business! We are very blessed to have Mike and his 25+ years with us.

name: Pat Ragan
text: Just had a new gas fireplace and mantel install last week. The workman ship was great. The workers were very professional in the work they did. They were very friendly and polite. I would definitely recommend  them for your fireplace and installation needs.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business! Hope you are still enjoying your fireplace!

name: M B
text: Mike was wonderful, very knowledgeable and a perfectionist, love our new fireplace would highly recommend atnip

resp.text: Thank you very much! We are very blessed to have Mike and for 25+ years. We hope you enjoy your new fireplace. Thank you for your business!

name: Sherry Sobul
text: Hired Atnip to fix two fireplaces. When they left they turned on.  Paid $180 for the service call. The next day when we tried to turn them on they did not turn on.   When we called we were told it was not their problem because they turned on when they left.

name: David Bland
text: Very helpful,

resp.text: Glad we could assist you.

name: Trent Martin
text: Wonderful folks that will go above and beyond to make sure you are happy!

resp.text: Thank you for your business!

We were extremely pleased with the time they took to explain the many options and the computer image of how our existing mantle would look with the chosen insert. They took time to explain the remote in detail. I would definitely recommend them

resp.text: It was our pleasure to work with you. We are glad to hear you are completely satisfied. We strive to have happy customers. Please let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: David Bland
text: Very helpful,

resp.text: Glad we could assist you.

name: Trent Martin
text: Wonderful folks that will go above and beyond to make sure you are happy!

resp.text: Thank you for your business!

name: Stefan Boyer
text: These guys are the best! They have a great selection of stone, as well as other landscaping suppliers. I know lots of pros that buy supplies here, but I've also seen them be very friendly and patient with do-it-yourselfers. In case you don't already have a contractor, they have outstanding install crews and a great maintenance/lawncare crew. This really is a one stop shop for your landscaping needs.

name: Nicholas Hoffman
text: Great location! Great prices! Friendly people!

name: David Fox
text: In and out. Good service.

name: James Fields
text: Professional and Extremely Helpful

resp.text: Hi James, we are pleased to hear that you are satisfied with your Acme Brick, Tile & Stone experience and appreciate the opportunity to serve you!

name: Derrick Stewart
text: It was good

resp.text: Thank you, Derrick, for sharing your experience with us and allowing Acme Brick, Tile & Stone to be a part of your home project.

name: Johnny Rabbit
text: This place should be located in the industrial zone of the city and not surrounded by residential housing. Heavy machinery from 8-5 throughout the week which vibrates homes far away, as well as being so loud that it sounds like cannons going off at the Battle of Dunkirk.

name: Michelle Coker
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable staff

name: Anonymous User
text: The white guy on the forklift is a lazy idiot

name: Kwam Boe
text: My personal brick,stone, and complete masonry suppliers

name: Jason Tew
text: Great products for home.

resp.text: We are pleased to see that you are satisfied with your Acme Brick, Tile & Stone experience. If you need further assistance, please let us know what we can do to ensure your utmost satisfaction.

name: Ashley McGee
text: Acme provided fantastic service and beautiful lvp flooring! Would absolutely use them again.

name: B K
text: Back in November I made a special order for some old Macon brick veneers  They had half of the order in stock and they said they'd order the other half I would be there in 2 weeks well I waited 2 weeks they didn't come on call me 2 more weeks still nothing I've called numerous times and been given the run around the sales person I believe is lying to me because of people in the office told me something completely different from what he said on the same day I asked both of them here it is February and I still don't have the other half of my order now my chimney is halfway done

name: Alejandro Rois-Méndez
text: Very kind people. It was a pleasure having visit them. It was a joy having met Joy and Mike, Alex

name: Lyle Webb
text: Thay was very helpful and very nice

name: Anonymous User
text: It's an acme brickyard. Nuff said

name: Reba Holdsambeck
text: This is my second time to do a project with Triton Stone in Huntsville.  They have an excellent selection of materials.  They are very knowledgeable and very willing to help you find the perfect piece for your project.  Both pieces we ended up using they had shipped from another facility so that we could see it in person before deciding.  I have had the pleasure of using Kay both times.  I would highly recommend using Triton Stone of Huntsville.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful feedback and review. Most importantly, thank you for being a customer of Triton Stone!

name: Monday Evans
text:
Had an appointment scheduled for July 24, 2020. Arrived at the showroom about 5 minutes early, walked inside with my daughter for my appointment and waited approximately 15 minutes, when a gentleman walked out and asked if we had been helped yet. After telling him we had not, he took us into the warehouse where the slabs were and also where Betty (the sales person supposed to be taking over my appointment) was chatting with a couple of other employees. We could hear them just on the other side of the door when we were waiting for her to come out and greet me for my appointment. They knew we were in the showroom, yet they continued chatting. Betty finally came over where the young man walked us to, showing us the slabs. After being in the store about 20 minutes at this point, they decide to do a temperature scan on us. It was hot in the warehouse and we had masks on. We both scanned 99 temps. They acted as if we had the plague. Betty behaved one the most rude way I’ve ever witnessed, in any environment but especially a sales environment where a customer is hoping to do business with the company they’re patronizing! Betty treated my daughter and I, first of all as if we had the plague and stayed probably 10 feet from us. Even once, when I turned to speak to her, she stepped back about 3 steps like I was about to attack her. Then she treated us as if she was doing us a favor by walking through he warehouse with us. She was not helpful AT ALL, and allowed two other people to take her away from assisting us! I held out as long as I could. It takes a lot to make me mad and I’m always kind to everyone, but she was so disrespectful and rude! I would NEVER hire her to work in my company and I hope the owner/manager reads this review and thinks twice about maintaining her as an employee! Betty has no idea how much I had planned to spend on my countertops, tile work, sinks and faucets! But she will NEVER know now!! Because I’ll find someone who DOES want my business and who respects myself and my daughter. You see, I own a successful business. But Betty has no idea of that. She treated me as if I were a homeless person who walked in off of the street with no money and no plans to purchase anything. Little did she know, I’ll be doing all of my business with OHM!!  And I’ll be sure to let everyone know how I was treated at Triton Stone in Huntsville, Alabama!!
By the way, I see that you guys ONLY respond to positive feedback! That says a lot about your customer service!!

resp.text:
We are so sorry to hear of your negative experience at our Huntsville showroom. This is definitely not the experience we expect to deliver to each customer. As you can imagine, navigating through these COVID times has been somewhat of a challenge. We try to remember that everyone has different situations or circumstances that can make them more cautious than others during this time. Betty is a long-standing employee who historically gets amazing reviews and feedback, and always displays a level of professionalism that holds true to Triton Stone's standards. We are grateful that Betty is able to continue to work for Triton Stone amid COVID. I am truly sorry that you felt disrespected in any way. As far as only responding to positive reviews, that is certainly not our intention. I prefer to speak with customers directly when they have had a negative experience, and more times than not, we are able to reach a solution. Since I personally respond to each situation, perhaps a response online has been overlooked in the past. I am happy to schedule a phone call with you to see if we can make things right. Please email info@tritonstonela.com with your information, and I will reach out.

Kindly,
Rachel Jones
Owner/Vice President

name: PAM MILAM
text:
In response to the review left by Monday Evans, I have never seen anything farther from the truth regarding my experience with Betty and the other team members. She and the other lady at the entrance counter (didn’t get her name) were so kind and professional. I have worked for the public most of my adult life and know 1st hand there can be some rude people on both ends but that was absolutely NOT the case. I’ve also come to realize that there are some folks you just cannot please no matter what you do!
Please do not let her comment deter you from at least giving them a try. It’s a shame that it’s the 1st one you see! Thanks Pam

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful feedback and review. Most importantly, thank you for being a customer of Triton Stone!

name: Carrie Tomlin
text: Great experience from start to finish! Picking out granite became a lot less overwhelming with the help of Kay and Betty. I was able to purchase my granite, faucets, tile, sink etc all in one stop and know it was all going to coordinate perfectly! Great experience and staff!

resp.text: Carrie, thank you for the wonderful review and kind words! We are committed to providing the highest level of customer service. Thank you for being a Triton Stone customer.

name: Joanna Decker
text: Our rep for Triton is Dan Stewart and I can't speak highly enough of him and his customer service. He is very knowledgeable about the industry and is always willing to help with any questions I may have, whether it be in regards to tools or materials. I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful feedback and review. Most importantly, thank you for being a customer of Triton Stone!

name: Leslie
text:
Jeff Came out to my home to measure for my new countertops in my kitchen. He was so kind and clearly so knowledgeable on granite.  He made the perfect recommendations for my coloring, sink and new faucet.  He said my next step was to go to their warehouse and pick out my slab of granite.

Today, I went to their showroom. And WOW!  Such beautiful pieces of granite. Kay was ready for me at my appointment time and walked me around the showroom.  Kay made me very comfortable and was very professional.   Jeff was spot on with the selections he recommended and Kay took me to see my new kitchen. I’m so excited and can not wait for my countertops to be finished and installed.

resp.text: Leslie, thank you for the wonderful review and kind words! We are committed to providing the highest level of customer service. Thank you for being a Triton Stone customer.

name: martha robison
text: Every time I walk in the door I am greeted with friendly, smiling faces. The employees make sure I have everything I need. Betty is especially good at helping me or my clients select colors for tile and granite. She always knows what is the best look for any project. Great prices, great showroom, great people.

resp.text: Martha, we are glad you have had a positive experience with Triton. Thank you for the positive feedback!

name: karla kilpatrick
text: Very friendly staff.  Betty....You Rock!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful feedback and review. Most importantly, thank you for being a customer of Triton Stone!

name: Matt Carroll
text: Really friendly staff and great selection. They helped me find just the right granite for my kitchen.

resp.text:
Matt,
Thank you for the 5 star review!

name: Faith Hines
text: Absolutely amazing! I was waiting and looking for a particular slab. They contacted me immediately when they had a new shipment come in. I never get this kind of customer service. Thank you Triton,

resp.text:
Faith,
Glad you found the right piece for your project. Thank you for the positive review!

name: Mary Ann Noble
text: Kay McNeal was amazing!  Wonderful product.  Wonderful experience.

resp.text:
Mary Ann,
Thank you for the 5 star review. Happy to hear you had a good experience, we think Kay is great too!

name: Alyssa Terry
text: I have purchased all my materials for several home projects from Triton (granite, tile, plumbing, vanities, etc). Their staff has been helpful with every step of the project ensuring that everything looks beautiful!

resp.text:
Alyssa,
We are glad you have been able to find what you need for your projects at our showroom. At Triton Stone, customer service is top priority, as is providing an enjoyable experience.

name: Joel Bridges
text: Very helpful and considerate experience. Low pressure.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting our store and for the feedback!

name: sandy leakeas
text: Love Triton Stone...great customer service! Will be back!

resp.text: Sandy, thank you for the positive review. We are happy to help in any way we can!

name: Chris Robertson
text: They were very helpful. I watched as they dealt with so many rude and pretentious  customers.

name: Brad Cook
text: Unprofessional.

name: Rhodeah2010
text: Great selection of landscape rocks and the service was excellent — very pleased with how our project turned out!

name: Martin Bachtel
text: Woerner is great.  They have an excellent tightly-knit staff that works well together.   It is my number one go-to place for sod.  They have the best combined prices on pallets and delivery in the metro.  I can’t say enough good things about the Tif Tuf Bermuda that they offer.  They also have a huge array of shrubs and trees.

resp.text: Thank You!

name: Andrew McCurry
text: Always willing to help load you up and get you out the door fast. That is important when you are trying to run a production based business.  Knowledgeable friendly staff. Great selection of plants and stone.

name: Er Tu2
text: I have always received prompt and courteous service from the knowledgeable staff. Highly recommended.

name: Joaquin Maldonado
text: Good place

name: Taylor Hardscapes
text: The management and staff at Woerner Landscaping are incredibly helpful and knowledgeable. Fantastic customer service you won't get anywhere else. Great selection and pricing.

name: Eric Beavers
text: Wide selection, knowledgeable & helpful staff. Convenient to Jefferson Shelby area. Delivery for larger  orders.

name: Jason Ciccarelli
text: Great people

resp.text: Thank You!

name: Ben Thomas
text: Great customer service and tons of knowledge.  The entire team there is top-notch. If you're looking for plants or hardscape material,  Woerner is the place to go.

name: Blake Jones
text: Great customer service! Friendly staff. Always there to help with any questions or concerns. Large selection of plants, stone, and sod

name: Bernard Doug Cook
text: I live adjacent to them, my apt community's (my) back yard backs up to their work area & M-F oftimes til 10:30 p.m., it's waahh, waahh, waahh, w/their forklifts going night& day!

name: Dwaine Segers
text: Good $ @ great peoply very helpful

name: Rodney Griffin
text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff

name: Jordan Boston
text: Great products

resp.text: Thanks Jordan for your review! We appreciate your business and thank you for shopping local!

name: James Ekelund
text: I drive an hour one way to explore this enterprise. I always find the lawn rock & stone decor I need, as well as nature's fertilize and other appealing rustic decor. Such a friendly, pleasant relaxing shopping experience at fair & reasonable pricing.

name: Terry Pitman
text: Fran's is a really interesting place with all sorts of things, not just landscaping but also collectibles and adornments for your home. Women would love this place as much as me, it is a very large and nice place to shop and explore.

name: Marta Stauts
text:
I love Fran’s on 59.
It has stones , gravel, beautiful large pots they can covert to fountains plus many garden decorative pieces.
Landscaping services is the best I ever used.
They are amazing to work with, excellent customer service.

name: Motel McCready
text: Fran's on 59 is a very unique. They have lots of cool statuary, fountains, a very large selection of stone. Friendly staff, very helpful  & knowledgeable. Stone patios, ponds, disappearing waterfalls and much more. Highly recommend checking them out.

name: David Swensen
text: There’s something new to see at Fran’s……..the Eclectic Room where you’ll find an amazing collection of high-end interior items including chandeliers, fine art, vintage jewelry, furniture, accent pieces and so much more!. You really must see the assortment to appreciate it.

name: Fran Hopkins
text: There’s something new to see at Fran’s……..the Eclectic Room where you’ll find an amazing collection of high-end interior items including chandeliers, fine art, vintage jewelry, furniture, accent pieces and so much more!. You really must see the assortment to appreciate it.

name: Sunny Chung
text: Absolutely LOVE my new countertop installed by Alabama Stoneworks. Cody and his associate came and installed it quickly and beautifully. Didn’t damage a single thing in my kitchen and was extremely respectful. Gave me good ideas of how to grout the gap left between the new countertop and the existing wall tile because i opted not to have them put the silicone caulk. I highly recommend this company. From the moment I contacted them to final installation it was smooth. There was one small issue with the faucet hose being pinched by the sink but they came right out and fixed it immediately.

name: Tint Pro
text: Glenda and David run an absolute top notch company! From the first phone call to the final wipe down they executed the best customer service. The entire team did a great job measuring, cutting, installing, and we absolutely love our new counters. I highly recommend this business!

name: Cherie Fancher
text:
Awesome people! Clear communication all the way
Everyone was courteous from sale to installation. Quality materials and service. The countertop looks great

name: John Gill
text: Super easy to work with, Glenda goes above and beyond to get your stone selection and details of fabrication the way you want. When the stone I wanted was out of stock with the local wholesalers, she tracked it down in New Orleans. When I came back with some extra pieces to make after the kitchen was in, they were immediately on top of it, I didn’t feel like I went to the back of the queue. Price was very competitive

name: palmer3acr
text: My wife and I used ASW for our countertops in our old home a few years ago. Great work at fair prices. Recently our auto repair shop (Green Garage) needed a flat surface to resurface a cylinder head from a vintage BMW we didn't trust giving to anyone else. ASW generously gave us a piece of scrap stone and even helped me load it in my car. They refused payment and only wanted referrals in return. Great people all the way around. Use them! Thank y'all again!

name: Steve Baccus
text: These are terrific folks. We went with the granite they suggested would go well with our cherry kitchen cabinetry and it is perfect! There was only a one week turnaround from when they removed the old counter tops, to the measuring of the template and then installation. There was a problem around the sink after installation, but I contacted them and they came back out the same day of installation and fixed it. All around great experience. My wife is very happy, so I am happy!

name: LaRinda Green
text: Glenda was wonderful from start to finish.   Due to covid, they were only seeing people by appointment but on the day I called she told me if I had measurements, she could email me a quote.  From that day, to the install on today,  it was a smooth process.  The installers were great at answering any questions I had and were so polite to the whole family.  Thank you ASW,  I am so happy.

name: R. Cherri Pitts
text: As an architect and builder, I’ve worked on many projects with them  from basic countertops to highly custom projects. They are are my go to crew. We just finished a project that they fabricated a floating marble sink with a sliver of a slot drain that makes everyone stop in their tracks to study it-even the building inspector!!! They are great people, and I highly recommend them!

name: Amanda Kidney
text:
Bought my decorative egg rock from them. It turned out beautiful.
Bought sod from them, it thrived.
Thought I'd save $25 on my next sod purchase and bought from another supplier in Mobile,  I regret it. The other sod I got is sickly and struggling, the pieces were falling apart as we tried to lay them.
The extra $25 per pallet is well worth it at woerner for healthy and thriving sod. (Centipede)

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad we were able to help and do hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Johnny Williams
text: Very well stocked. The staff was extremely helpful. I will be back for sure.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad we were able to help and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Chad kiper
text: Great products. Friendly employees. A+

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad we were able to help and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Pamela Waleri
text: Monday delivery. Very good company to work with.

name: Andrew Carstarphen
text: Great service firm the guy that loaded my car with the items I purchased

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad we were able to help and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Ivan Martinez
text: Beat place to get sod in the area and they offer military discount!

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad you had a great experience and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Kim
text: Always a-1 service with smiles...always enjoy my trips there.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. We are so happy that we made your experience at our store a good one, customer service is a top priority for Woerner Turf. We hope you visit us again soon!

name: B C
text: Built a deck and walkway at my house last fall. David and the crew in Mobile helped with materials and advice. I got a great deal on some cut stone, sand, gravel, dirt, beach pebbles, and sod. Planted a flower bed in a galvanized trough and used the gravel for drainage. Built the walkway with the cut stone and used the beach pebble around some of the bushes. The grass took some time since I planted it in the fall, but it came out great in the spring. I will definitely be back for my next DIY project.

resp.text: Thanks for the detailed review, B C!

name: Michael Thompson
text: I’m a concrete contractor that uses these guys from time to time. They are a bit expensive, but I don’t mind paying for good service and quality products. We have purchased gravel, wall blocks, pavers and stones from them in the past. I always recommend them to customers for any of their personal landscaping needs. I went in to purchase some pea gravel and when I reminded the girl at the front desk that I should get contractor price, she was extremely rude. I probably would have went ahead and got an account, but she was so rude and disrespectful I never had a chance. Her name is Carla and I suggest someone in management teach her manners. I’ll use other stores for my products and not recommend them anymore if this is how they could be treated. By the way, I can go a bit further and get gravel from one of the trucking companies for half the cost.

resp.text: Michael, We are sorry about your experience at our store. We hope that you will give us another chance later down the road.

name: Benjamin Stout
text: Very very poor way of doing business! Today makes the second time this week that I have tried to purchase a large amount of rock from you and was not successful. I waited in line before you were open only for you to help others that came way after me first. I waited over 2 hours the other day and still was not helped. I will no longer do business with you and I will also no longer suggest you business to others. If you dont want the business close the location instead of doing business the way you are.

resp.text: Benjamin, We are sorry about your experience at our store. We hope that you will give us another chance later down the road.

name: Ewing Lawn Care
text: We have been using Woerner for many years and have always been satisfied with the quality of materials, as well as the superb customer service.  The employees are always friendly and give excellent advice on the products they sell.  I'm always impressed with how the employees are hustling to load materials for customers, as this is very rare to see these days!

name: Dante Piccini
text: This place has some great sod, I would highly recommend getting sod from them. Also any question about sod, pavers, insecticides, watering schedules, they are very friendly and helpful in answering any questions I had. Steven, Carla, and all the guys inside and those helping to load outside are very friendly and good people. I'm happy to do my business with them and will continue to do so knowing that their expertise and products are very good. Even if you are not sure about something, I would recommend going in person or calling them, they are very helpful. 5/5 for me.

name: david street
text: Always professional and courteous service - and very "veteran-friendly". Always ready answer any questions. I highly recommend them for any yard or gardening needs. Thanks to you all... Regards.

name: Scarlett Harrison
text: As a landscaper, this is the only place I will get my sod and landscape products! The quality is amazing! The staff is super friendly and extremely helpful! I’ve been a customer for over 15 years and counting! 😊

name: Nate Crabtree
text: Great staff, help is always helpful. Materials are top notch at a good price with great selection. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you, Nate. Glad to help you.

name: Matt Jones
text: Great office staff. Materials are pretty good. I've gotten some rough looking sod here a few times but that's the only complaint. I go here alot.

resp.text: Thank you, Matt. We do try to do our best on quality control, so we apologize for any that has been not to your or our standards. See you again soon!

name: Sheila Vickery
text: We purchased over $7,000 of grass last March. We now have numerous weeds and crab grass instead of the centipede we paid for. Would not recommend them or ever use them again.

resp.text: Sheila, we do apologize. We do not have a warranty on our grass especially over a years time just because there are some many things that we do not have control over once it has left our field. Have you contacted our store? We would like to talk with you, Do you mind if we reach out to you?

name: Christina Carr
text: Great service.  Great product.   Always has what I need.  My go to place for all of my landscape needs.

resp.text: We are glad we are able to help you!

name: Ryan Ludvik
text: They are always super friendly, have great selections and prices for premium dog food, and though my dogs are both 80lbs of hugs and kisses, they're always accepting and don't mind. Anytime someone needs dog food or lawn items, I always suggest Woerner's!

name: Ross Hatcher
text: This is a really neat store if you're into landscaping.  I could easily spend enough money here to make my wife pretty angry.  I've bought sand and gravel here recently, and the prices seem very fair.  They also got me in and out pretty quickly.  On my last trip to buy gravel, the load got pretty heavy and made my trailer tires look pretty deflated.  The young guy who loaded it then had me follow him to get some complimentary air from their compressor to make sure I got home safely.  Great service!

name: kim nelson
text: Great Service and friendly staff. They were very knowledgeable about what products I needed for my lawn.

name: j Wayne
text: Our company Quality sod and lawn care has been using woernrs for over 20yrs always good service

name: Matthew Jenkins
text: I have purchased many loads of gravel, sand, and rock from them. They have always been friendly and helpful and the price is right. I have been to many places like this around the area and Woerner beats them all in service, selection, and price.

name: Deeanna Smith
text: I picked up "clean long leaf straw" for a new customer. Well, that was a lie. Loads of trash and straw that was old and very brittle. I even took pictures. Called to speak to mgr. He was very rude. He said he sold 1500 bales a week and hadn't had a complaint. I will never go there again. Lowes has better pinestraw.

resp.text: Hey Deanna, we are sorry to hear the experience and purchase was not acceptable. We will follow up and find a resolution soon.

name: John McCabe
text: I frequent this store for sod and pinestraw mostly.  They always have better service and superior products than their competitors.

name: David Vincent
text: Everyone I come in they are very helpful and polite

name: Bill Huber
text: I buy some sod and dyed pine straw here several times per year.  They always have what I need and the staff is always friendly and helpful.

name: Chase Nelson
text: The absolute worst turf supplier in the area.  I purchased a pallet of grass a while back. After it was picked up and delivered to my home where it was laid in the area prepared, I discovered that more than half the grass was already dead and falling apart. This was the worst choice!

resp.text: Chase, we do apologize for any previous experiences you have had with us. We are under new management at this location. We hope that you will give us another chance in the future to change your mind about our business. And again we are sincerely apologetic.

name: Scott Griffith
text: Purchased a load of pea gravel. The service was prompt, professional, and the price was reasonable.

name: Half Time
text: Great staff

name: Shay Rivers
text: Wow! I love this place!

name: Hunter Walker
text: Great place

name: Matthew Blackmon
text: Great service

name: David Pham
text:
(Translated by Google) It sells all kinds of building stones, people can come here to choose from the price is very good better than homedepot and low here. You may get a discount when you buy a lot. 👌👌👌

(Original)
Nơi đây bán tất cả các loại đá xây dựng mọi người có thể đến đây lựa chọn thoả mái giá cả rất tốt tốt hơn homedepot và low tại đây. Có thể bạn sẽ được giảm giá khi mua nhiều. 👌👌👌

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are glad you had a great experience and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Teresa MacDonald
text: I love my new countertops! Thank you so much to everyone at Executive Granite for making this such a great experience🙂🙂

name: Sylvia Elizabeth
text: These people at this company are all wonderful!

name: Sherri House
text: These guys are amazing. They do great work and their customer service is outstanding!

name: Corinne Giles
text: Called to see if they had any Cynclips to use on my dropped kitchen sink and the man said they didn't use those, rather they drilled holes on the backside of the Granite when cutting.  (Which is the right way to do it, I have read.). He then gave me a several suggestions on how to fix the problem without buying the clips.  I was so appreciative since my husband is trying to tackle the issue instead of paying for someone to do it.  I will be contacting Surface One in the future to install bathroom countertops.

resp.text: Thank you, Corinne Giles! We appreciate that you took the time to post this review and we look forward to working with you on those bathroom tops. S1

name: Alicia Hale
text: Totally Satisfied!  Surface One in Pelham installed quartz countertops for us and we are so happy with the finished product.  Ryan helped us pick out the perfect countertops based on what we were looking for.  They were professional from the time we shopped until everything was done.  We went to several places for quotes and Surface One was cheaper than the others.

name: Melissa
text: Nice on phone but if you don't have a big project then don't bother. Drive 45 min for them not to help and not care.

name: Stuart Nicholson
text: We are very happy with the service and the counters that we received from Surface One. Everyone we dealt with was very happy and they went out of their way to get the material we preferred. Bruce, Tebra, Cheryl, and Mary Margaret answered any questions we had and made sure we got what we wanted. Brent, who measured the kitchen, was very knowledgeable and explained the whole fabrication and installation process. Thank you to everyone!

name: Dawn Calvert
text: Great selection of material to choose from.  Great customer service!

resp.text: Thank you, Dawn. We appreciate your review and your business!

name: Kevin McPherson
text: These guys are the best I have seen in the Birmingham area!  Otstanding customer service, great products, quality installations from a top notch, very professional solid surface company!!

name: Larry Wyatt
text: We stopped in to get prices for a kitchen counter top remodel. Sales person not very knowledgeable and did not offer us a price while we were there. Told us she would email quote "within the hour" well it has been almost 2 weeks, and no quote. If you can not provide pricing when promised I sure will not trust you to provide materials. We will not be purchasing here

name: james
text: Awesome selection of granite and solid surface and very friendly and knowledgeable staff. Very experienced fabricators and installers.

name: Liz Burton
text:
This company was subcontracted by my kitchen remodel company to provide granite countertops.  First issue is that they will not come measure 'after hours' so we had to take off work to be available.  The job required 4 pieces of granite, one to be joined.  Again we were asked to take off work to come view the work particularly the joint.  They had equipment in front of one of the pieces, so we missed the fact that this piece was too short on the end.  The sealer from counter to cabinet even showed.
We complained thru the contractor and Surface One gave them a heard time about  replacing it.  After weeks of waiting they sent two workers out and again the piece was too short.  After that, they finally sent someone out to measure again.  A third piece was sent out after 9 or so weeks and this piece finally fit.  Not only were we put out because of lost of time in the kitchen, but the installer with the third piece was the original installer and he told us he told the Source One owner that he knew we would not be happy with the first piece.  So this is the kind of shoddy work they try to get away with.  Not to mention the lack of cooperation with my contractor to work out the issue.  I would not recommend them.

name: Brenda Lynn
text: Great customer service. Very professional.

name: David Hunt
text: Good job!

name: Carna Triftshauser
text:
Worst Customer Service. I purchased tile on Sept 28th and still don’t have my full order. Last week I emailed 3 times and called. NO RESPONSE. I was told the last box shipped on 10/26 on Nov 2 and that it would be here Nov 3rd. I arrived on Nov 5th to pick it up and was then told it was shipped yesterday and hopefully it might be here on the 6th. Not even an I’m sorry for all the issues. Just tossed the paper back to me through a gate and said oh well.

WILL NEVER USE THIS COMPANY AGAIN!!!

name: Amanda
text: Started off with a great experience at the sales office. While the two employees working the office could not provide a solution to my issue they asked for me to leave my contact information with them, and provided the business card for a coworker that might be able to help. I was told they would have that person give me a call to set up an appointment to have someone come out to my house to see if they can troubleshoot my issue and possibly come up with a solution. After nearly a week there has been no communication from them. Instead, I had to call the person on the business card only to then be told he was not the right person and that he needed to have someone else call me back instead. Still waiting on that call back. My problem is that I bought a set of glass fireplace doors for my fireplace that I should be able to easily install myself, but they do not fit by just a few millimeters in height. I have double checked that I got the correct doors. I know the manufacturer and model number of my fireplace, so I bought the coordinating doors for my fireplace. I am worried that the fireplace and/or tile surround was not done properly and therefore might be the cause of my issue. Please beware this company installs the fireplaces and does the tile/brick work for Lowder New Homes, so if you are a Lowder homeowner you could run into similar issues in the future!!

name: Joseph Farris
text: Told me an order would be delivered in a week took over 3 months and were near impossible to communicate with

name: Missy Powell
text: Beautiful Store. Unbelievable selection, too many to choose. Friendly, Experienced assistance to help you with your choice. Can order anything also!

name: Janie Sims
text: Elizabeth was awesome and can really perfect items by putting them together

name: Shelia Hammonds
text: Great selection  of tile and customer y

name: Daisy Pippin
text: They have an awesome and unique, one of a  selection of flooring,tile, countertops,etc.

name: Josh Hamby
text: Higher price but better quality than Lowes and Home Depot

name: Sean Richards
text: We really enjoyed working with Bryan and team. The worked on building an outdoor kitchen, flagstone path and rebuilding flagstone steps. They delivered on their commitments to high quality and ensuring we were happy with the project completion before asking for payment. They communicate upfront in an effective and frequent manner. They also improved on the ideas we had for the project and brought their knowledge and experience to help us make decisions that made sense. If you are considering them for a project you won’t find any better. I’m now looking for more opportunities to work with them!!

name: Steven Pearl
text: Bryan and his team were fantastic to work with! They were responsive, hard working, professional and paid incredible attention to detail on the entire project. The completely exceeded our expectations as far as what the space would look like. What started as a boring backyard turned into a resort looking space that we never want to leave! Can’t thank Bryan and his team enough for delivering such a perfect outdoor space for us to enjoy!

name: Amanda Champion
text: We had an awesome experience with The Backyard Auburn.  Bryan's crew did an amazing job on our flagstone sidewalk and sitting area.  They were prompt, professional and worked nonstop to get the job done.  Will definitely use them again for future projects.

name: Lauren Mackey
text: The Backyard just completed 2 flagstone patios, with a rock bench, and firepit in our backyard. It turned out better than we ever expected! They were exceptional with quality, communication, and worked quickly while paying close attention to detail. You can tell they take pride in what they do. We previously had a flagstone path done by another company and the end products don't even compare. The Backyard's patio is definitely a far superior finish. We really enjoyed working with our job's Forman Kensley and all of his crew they were fantastic to work with! If you need someone to update your outdoor space, then I highly recommend The Backyard in Auburn!

name: Cynthia Waldrep
text: Excellent all around with outstanding service, communication and overall experience!  Brian and his team were awesome and easy to work with.  I called one afternoon to inquire about an outdoor stone fireplace and he was at my lake house the very next morning.  After sharing his ideas and his vision with me, we ended up adding an outdoor kitchen as well and I could not be happier!!  The price he quoted was reasonable and the work was done as specified in a timely manner.  So happy I found Brian and The Backyard and I will definitely use them again!

name: Eric Cross
text: Outstanding quality and service! Nothing but praise for the entire company. Brian and Kendall made this such an easy process. Highly recommend!

name: Steve Toledo
text: Brian the owner is amazing to work with. His stone is high quality and the delivery was simple and easy. 5 star overall very professional and would definitely use again!

name: Diana Catrett
text: Great work, would highly recommend The Backyard.  They know what they are doing and the crew that did the work were great.  They finished the job in one day.  That arrived at 7 am and worked non stop except for a lunch break.  Kensley was very polite and reassuring that if I had any questions I thought of later, not to hesitate to call.  After the job was complete, I received a phone call from Bryan Waites asking if I had any questions and if I was happy with the work.  Can't say enough good things about this company!

name: Bob Parker
text:
Every person at The Backyard has been a pleasure in the way they conduct their business. Extremely professional and courteous with their customers interest and satisfaction as the focus of their business. We just finished an expansion of our porch to a patio with a new stone surface throughout and the finished product is perfect.  Bryan listened to our requests and offered some excellent input that helped us with our final decision.
They arrived on time and stayed until all the work was finished. The cleanup of our yard was excellent as well as the front street and sidewalk after all was finished. The yard, including grass and flower beds were as if nothing had been disturbed.
We could not be more pleased from start to finish. Polite and respectful crew members and excellent, quality workmanship means we will call Bryan again for more work as we continue our landscaping plans.

name: R Blanchard
text: Hired Brian and his team to put in a patio and firepit to match our house on the lake.  Brian was patient as we tried to figure out the best way to situate the firepit.  He just completed the work and we couldn't be happier with the way it turned out.  Top quality work at a reasonable price.  Most importantly he communicated and showed up when he said he would.  Something I'm not use to living on the lake. Thanks again Brian. Highly recommend!

name: Molly Wilson
text: Love the new patio The Backyard installed today!  Already asked if they can install another one!  Very hardworking crew. I highly recommend them!

name: Brian Weiss
text: Bryan and his team at The Backyard of Auburn are absolutely the best in the business. Great communication, high attention to detail, and with a finished product that will WOW you for years to come. They completed a beautiful stone retaining wall with large stone steps up to our pool three years ago, and just last week capped our pool deck with stunning flagstone - breathtaking! This decision absolutely transformed our pool, and we cannot wait for family and friends to enjoy it with us. Bryan truly cares about his customers and stands by his work. We have "one more" project and with no hesitation it will be Bryan and his team with The Backyard.

name: Brittney Thaxton
text: Our patio was finished yesterday and to say we are extremely pleased would be an understatement!!! Everything was completed on time and at the amount we were quoted. We will definitely reach out to get our front porch done later this year. Completely blown away with how much this has refreshed our yard!!! I highly recommend The Backyard Auburn!!

name: Ken Tidwell
text: Bryan Waits of The Backyard has done 2 projects for us in the last year. They installed a short height but long rock wall and several rock planters along with a flagstone walkway on the first project. It was done on time and budget. The work was quality and looked wonderful. The second project that they just finished was another walkway from our deck to the fire pit. It turned out wonderfully just like the other one did. His guys are very professional and nice to work with. I would recommend them highly.

name: jen jones
text: I highly recommend Brian and Backyard Auburn. He listed to what our vision was and the finished patio is exactly what we wanted.

name: Hope Henderson
text: We had a patio and a wall built at our house.  Bryan and the crew did exactly as promised.  They came here and worked hard for three days and finished.  We love the new patio and wall!  It transformed the front of our house into something beautiful!  Thank you so much!  Hope and Mark

name: Chuck Isbell, M.D.
text: Bryan and his crew recently installed  this quarry stone wall for a raised flower bed in my sloped front yard. They got on the project quickly, completed it in a couple of hours, and the cost was very reasonable. The quality of workmanship is excellent and I am thrilled with the results. If I have any future work like this I know exactly who to call! I would recommend Bryan and his staff at The Backyard to anyone needing the services they provide.

name: latricia weatherford
text: Extremely amazing place. The owner actually took my call and came in on a Sunday to help us. Thanks so much Backyard!

name: David Shropshire
text: The Backyard in Auburn did a beautiful job laying stone over our existing concrete sidewalk, and extending our back patio. They are experts in working with natural stone, but I was equally impressed with the owner's (Bryan) commitment to customer service and follow-up to insure we were satisfied when the job was finished.

name: joe best
text: This company is top notch!  They did a superb job and cleaned up afterwards after putting in a Flagstone patio for us. They exceeded all of my expectations I closing being responsibly priced. Will use them again for any other projects!

name: Laura Kincaid
text: Bryan and his skilled team of professionals just completed a project for us that has exceeded our expectations in every way possible. The customer service and attention to detail are unmatched. The Backyard can completely transform your outdoor space. HIGHLY recommend!!

name: Bill Baas
text:
Bryan and his team are awesome.  It's incredible to watch them work, they are well oiled machine and produce awesome looking brick and stone work.

This is my third experience with Bryan and The Backyard Team.  Excellent communication, quality work and clean up after the job was complete.

name: Foster White Jr
text: Great place with great service.

name: Vicki Cross
text: Mr. Bryan, Thank you so much for the outstanding job you and your wonderful staff have provided to us! Everything is so beautiful!  I love it!  From the moment you and your staff arrived, we have received the most outstanding services anyone could have ever wanted!  Everyone was so courteous, kind and the most professionally organized organization I have ever experienced!  You were always on time and each individual worked hard to achieve the highest level of quality in service and production of product satisfaction!  I could infinitely go on about you, your staff and the BEAUTIFUL FIREPLACE AND PATIO you designed and built in my backyard!  You are the Chick Fil-A in masonry construction!!!   Chick-Fil-A is known for their quality in service and delicious food.  You, Sir, are second to none with your quality of service and product satisfaction!  Each of you are artist when it comes to your work product.  Your signature has been permanently engraved in the beautiful fireplace in my yard!!! Thank you so much for allowing me the honor to receive one of your beautiful fireplace/patio signatures pieces !  Again, thank you for everything!   May GOD BLESS each of you in every way!  Y’all are the greatest!

name: Debbie Smith
text: The Backyard crew installed a flagstone patio, walkway, and flowerbed surround for us and we couldn’t be happier!  The crew was very skilled, hard-working, careful and courteous and did a beautiful job. I highly recommend them for any such project!

name: Randel Whitehead
text: Brian and his team were so great to work with and the product they provide is wonderful! We told Brian our budget for the project and he worked with us to design our patio and fire pit. His team was on time each morning and worked hard throughout the project to finish on time as promised. He is great to work with and I could not recommend him more!

name: Maria Gilleland
text:
Brian and his crew are fabulous! Prompt, professional, reasonably priced and a pleasure to work with! Had a stone walkway put in; looks great! I will be calling in Brian and his team again for the next project!
Maria G.
Auburn

name: Laurie Pearce
text: About a year or so ago Bryan made us a flagstoned patio , so the other day I called him to help us again with a patio once again you could not have asked for anyone better. Always professional and his help is always nice and Courteous and the workmanship is the best around. Highly recommend. Will do business with him again.

name: Tamara Byal
text: We had an amazing experience with The Backyard.  Brian and his team were exceptional. They showed up when they said they would and we’re very efficient. They arrived at 7:30am and completed the job by 2:30pm turning a worthless portion of our yard into a beautiful flag stone patio with a fire pit.  Brian had contacts to connect our gas line to the fire pit and was very knowledgeable about how to drain water away from the area.   Very reasonably priced. A seamless, wonderful experience and we wholeheartedly recommend this company!

name: Ben Pugh
text: Great work and great communication! The Backyard is who you want to use for your all stonework or other hardscape needs.

name: Will Tampling
text: What a professional job! We couldn’t be more pleased with the job Brian Waites and his crew did on our flower bed borders. They were prompt, worked a solid day, cleaned up after themselves and very reasonably priced. I would highly recommend, and will!! Thank you to “The Backyard”.

name: Helene Fincke
text: Bryan and his team are very professional and talented at what they do. The team who installed my patio were very focused on their task which was completed in a timely manner and looks beautiful.They take great pride in their work. Everyone was very easy to work with. Their work is first class. I would highly recommend them.

name: Sherri Rainer
text: Bryan and his team do beautiful stone work!  I can not say enough about how easy Bryan made our project come together.  His years of experience, professionalism, and consideration of our needs made all the difference!  I look forward to future projects with The Backyard!

name: Jay Fain
text: I couldn’t think of a better place to buy my Big Green Egg. The staff was very accommodating and made my decision very easy. They have every accessory for a Bug Green Egg you could ever ask for. Plus, they have a beautiful selection of planters and natural stone to choose from.

name: Paul Olsen
text: We hired The Backyard to renovate an existing patio and install a new walkway and stone fire pit.  We found their work to be extremely high quality and performed on the schedule they committed to, and they demonstrated in a number of ways that they were clearly committed to making sure we were satisfied.  I'd absolutely, highly recommend them.

name: Stephanie Simmons
text: These guys were very easy to work with, and I was very happy with the end result. I would definitely work with them again!

name: LaDonna Thornton
text: Backyard Auburn did a great job on my patio and walkway.  I love it!  They were extremely easy to work with and very accommodating.  I would definitely use them again.

name: david giegel
text: Brian was very responsive and made sure every detail of our project was perfect.  I would highly recommend  them!

name: leigh nicks
text: Brian and his team are nothing short of amazing. Their professionalism, efficiency, craftsmanship, and respect are top notch. They have constructed two slate patios and a rock garden drainage system for us, and we will continue to ask for their services for all future projects.

name: Blake Hobbs
text: The Backyard Auburn does beautiful top quality work! They are always timely on projects and always produce exceptional work. We highly recommend using them for any projects you have in mind.

name: Taylor Rogers
text:
We highly recommend The Backyard Auburn.  Our job was done on time and on budget.  The work looks great and is done to very high standards.

Looking forward to getting more work done!

name: T.C. Fincher
text: We just had a small project completed by The Backyard and are pleased to say they did a beautiful job!  I will not hesitate to have them do other projects for us in the future.  Brian and his team were all very professional, polite, and helpful. If you ride out to their business you can see several examples of their workmanship and get ideas as well.   I highly recommend The Backyard.

name: Schuyler Watrous
text: Look no where else for your patio construction needs.  Brian and his crew have done two jobs for me.  The first he came back to fix a job that was done incorrectly by another builder.  Had to rip it up and start over.  The second job was just completed and we are so happy.  They are in and out in no time.

name: Michael Rabren
text: Brian and his employees have done several jobs for me and have always done a professional job! I would highly recommend The Backyard for any of your masonry needs.

name: Kimberly Munshower
text: Excellent end product! The process was quick and simple. Brian worked with me and adjusted on the fly to accommodate my wishes. The workmanship is incredible and the pride of ones work apparent!!  Also, the clean up was meticulous!! Can't wait for our next project!! Thanks Brian

name: Reynolds Outdoors
text: Bryan's team did a great job with our patio extension. They got the job done quickly and it looks great. I will definitely use them again in the future.

name: Matt Harrison
text: Quality work done on time and at quoted price. Stone columns we had installed had small details that set them apart from others. Jobsite condition was spotless after completion.

name: Richard Himmer
text: They did exactly what they said they would do.  I thought I had a problem with my walkway but it was done correctly.  He was willing to do whatever it took to make me happy.  Wish all contractors were like him

name: Benjamin Fagan
text: We're thrilled with the work of Brian and his team. They installed a patio and front walkway of reclaimed brick pavers, in a herringbone pattern. The work was done on time and at the price quoted, and we will definitely be repeat customers if the need arises.

name: Edward Pearce
text: Bryan and his crew were very professional and easy to work with , he built a 280 sq.foot flagstone patio with a table for a big green egg. Bryan made great recommendations to guide us with the right design. I highly recommend Bryan and his crew. Will do business with him again

name: Jennifer Robinson
text:
Brian and his crew did a fabulous job on a beautiful patio at my new house. I had been trying to figure out on my own exactly what I wanted and all my ideas just didn’t feel right. Brian came out and with his years of expertise was able to quickly come up with a plan that I immediately knew was just what I had been trying to come up with and failing miserable at. I get so many compliments on this patio and seating wall from all my neighbors.

Would highly recommend!! Top quality work!!

name: Greg Carlson
text: Fire pit patio constructed in 5 hours and is beautiful!  These guys were a well oiled machine.

name: Jacqueline Vaughan
text: I'm so delighted with the quality of work Bryan and his crew performed on the flagstone patio & walkway. He was able to schedule project sooner and job completed in a timely matter. Additionally, I very much appreciated Bryan's professional demeanor as we worked a through a  minor design change.  Would highly recommend his services to others.

name: teresa page
text:
“The Backyard” out of Auburn, Alabama..
I watched the ugly transform into the beautiful.
Brian Wait’s team did a wonderful job!
Way above my expectations,  Happy customer in Salem, Alabama.
Thank you!!☀️☀️

name: Theresa O'Steen
text: Over the years we have had Brian and his crew work for us on several backyard projects at our properties.  These have included a fire pit flagstone patio and a walkway.  He has always been professional and easy to discuss what we wanted and his follow through has been excellent.  I highly recommend them.  I tried to do a patio once DIY style, big mistake.  Call Brian he's an artist with stone.

name: Chris Rehm, Sr.
text: I had Backyard Of Auburn do a project in my backyard in Auburn.. They did a fantastic job. We had kudzu and bamboo and erosion with a drainage ditch through the yard.  Brian and his crew cleared the yard tiered the yard and put down a tarp and rocks and in the drainage ditch large rock and it looks wonderful. I could not be more pleased. I would highly recommend them to anyone.

name: Michael Scifres
text: Bryan and his guys did an astounding job at re-doing our covered patio. The old concrete was torn out and replaced with flagstone that looks amazing. All done in one day. Will definitely be using again in the future!

name: Philippe Scheys
text: Bryan and his crew are great to work with on projects to enhance your outdoor space. The end product is beautiful and professionally built, and in a very short time-frame!

name: Dane Griffith
text: I've worked with Bryan and The Backyard on three different projects.  They are always professional and the quality of their work is of the highest quality.  You can't go wrong with The Backyard!!

name: David Thomason
text: Brian was friendly and proactive. He called several days ahead of the appointed installation date to confirm and was onsite exactly on time. As a retired construction manager I appreciated the high quality of the workmanship. Brian also called to follow up after the work was done. I highly recommend The Backyard to anyone wanting stone work done.

name: James Long
text: Bryan and the folks at The Backyard were awesome! The prices were competitive and the quality was outstanding. I had them do a 290 square foot rock patio and I couldn't be happier. I would definitely use them again. Highly recommended!

name: Chris Kearns
text: Bryan and his crew haven't done a project for me lately, but at one time they rebuilt some entrance columns and a commercial sign for me a few years.  They looked good at the time, and they still look great years later.  Now they are doing outdoor kitchens too?  Maybe it's time for another project - a fun one.

name: Shannon Belletti
text: Drove 40 minutes to their store. Arrived over an hour before closing time and no one here. (Wednesday afternoon in June) Sign on door said to call for assistance. Tried calling twice but no answer and no way to leave a message.

name: Larry Wilson
text: Was in need of fireplace work and Backyard did a great job .

name: Jr Feild
text:
Brian Waits and the Backyard crew came to my house and completed a large flagstone patio for me.  His price was fair; their work was unbelievably quick and excellent!  The work was done on time and at the price Brian quoted.  I rate their work as 5 stars and we are very happy with our completed patio.

Junior Feild

name: D
text: Outstanding workmanship and looks great! I highly recommend The Backyard to anyone who wants it done right.

name: Cindy Fischer
text: Web site says Sat 8am till 2pm drove from Evergreen Al to a closed store!! 😠. You lost a sale I wont come back!

resp.text: We are very sorry for the miscommunication about our Saturday hours. We are not open on Saturdays in the winter, but the Google hours were not updated. If you'd be willing to try us again we would love to help in the future!

name: Matt Allen
text: Davis Cox is awesome to work with. Found the Brick that was perfect. Thanks Buddy.

name: Taylor Chatham
text:
I am giving acme brick 1 star for their pretty displays on kitchen backslashes. Its hard to see the samples the way they are hung. Which isnt a deal breaker but brick color advice from 2 team members was very alarming!

I went with a photo of a fence we will be adding to. I said verbatim to the lady at the front desk & she asked to see the pic and told old tavern in a mere glance. Im an artist and when i saw old tavern I wanted to see someone who knew a thing or two ..... i got the same answer!!!!!!!????!!

I knew immediately I wasn't kookie so I researched it and instantly felt like a side by side would do justice and more than that it did. However,  I may buy from them under my alias but am weary of how much i can trust these people. Research and think ahead before going if u do decide to.

name: Christopher Lancaster
text: Fast  prompt service...in and out with a breeze

name: Sean
text:
The staff showed us a previously unconsidered option for our new patio, ultra hard and thick porcelain! It's been installed a few years now and we're extremely grateful we didn't go with real or fake stone.
Also, they carry Fire Magic grills, a very high quality American made line of grills.

name: randy taylor
text: This place is the perfect place to go if you wanna meet someone who calls their uncle, daddy! Intelligence level of gum stuck to the bottom of a table. They way over charge you for their product. Go to the source it's way cheaper, I know one supplier is Sioux city brick. Their are many more in Alabama. Cut the middle man out save yourself some time and money.

name: Charles Britton
text: I'm a drver deliverd here dont turn on street in front go to Intergraph way street on other side of motel to make a brick delivery tight yard..didn't take long to unload me. But it close to closing on a Friday ...

name: Janice Henry
text: Excellent pricing and selection.

name: Skinner Family
text: Great selection and knowledgeable staff. Happy to bring my business here.

name: Jonathon H.
text: ACME Brick and Tile is an amazing local company and I whole heartedly recommend them. They donated all of the pavers for my Eagle Project at Aldersgate Methodist Church on time with no problems. They help the community and provide excellent service.

name: Ruby Winkles
text: Very helpful picking out tile for my bathroom

name: Walter Walker
text: EXTREMELY helpful staff. I will use them again.

name: Steve P.
text: Called at 4:20pm on a normal working day. There message said they were open till 5:00pm. You should answer the phone during normal business hours. If you can't, don't post them.

name: Richard Agee
text: worse customer service I've seen in a long time,  don't answer there phones cant get your delivery when scheduled.

name: Theodore Warren
text: Hated

name: Shawn Abol
text:
worse place i shopped
because of there delivery
